name: Last (NoonTimeDreamer)
description:
Things have gone crazy!  All that's left for you to do is to keep your supplies loaded and keep moving. Do your best to squeeze every bit into your little box of control or else it will be lost to the wild. 

A little tetris-inspired space management game. Pack your things properly and last as long as you can in a crazy world of apocalypses. Don't leave your things out of your control.

Instructions

  • Left Click to drag and drop
  • Right Click to rotate
  • Don't forget the essential piece!

Programs Used

  • Godot
  • Audacity
  • Inkscape

Credit

  • Background music is the Dark Things by Eric Matyas
  • Icons are sourced from the internet
